item.description:
Dear NEPN photographers,

Please join Novembers photography challenge. "My Town".

It should be a shot of something representing your artistic style that tells us something about the town you live in or the town you grew up in. - Incorporating Thanksgiving is encouraged.

For instance, I grew up in Needham. We have the longest running Thanksgiving day football game in the country Needham v. Wellesley. A shot of the game from the Hilltop would be ideal for this challenge... let your creativity show!

Eileen
item.name: NEPN Photography Challenge: November: My Town
